page.title: 05Family life in Bexhill
page.content: Family life is alive and well in Bexhill. With many estates, most of Bexhill's community is close-knit. People are always on hand to help sick or{disabled}neighbours. During the week{school}ends at about 3.30pm. As children make their way home, the adults are winding up their day. For those families with working parents, the evening meal usually comes at about 6.30pm. {Church}groups, scouts,cubs,guides and brownies occupy people during the evening hours. At weekends people in Bexhill like to get outside and around the town. Of course in summer months the locals like to share the beach with holiday makers. A lot of shopping is done, but people usually take a trip to either Hastings or Eastbourne. Sunday is spent quietly at home eating Sunday dinner and going to Church.
